SEARCH
Package my.uum

Class DatabaseConnect

java.lang.Object
my.uum.DatabaseConnect
public class DatabaseConnect extends Object
This class is for connecting to SQLite database. hence the data can be inserted, deleted and selected.

    • connect

      public static Connection connect()

      Returns:
      connect

    • insertUser

      public void insertUser(String user_name, String ic_no, String staff_id, String phone_no, String email)
      This method is used to insert users' data into tbl_user.
      Parameters:
      user_name - User should key in his or her name
      ic_no - User should key in i/c number
      staff_id - User should key in staff id
      phone_no - User should in phone number
      email - User should in email

    • updateUser

      public void updateUser(String email, String phone_no, String staff_id)
      This method is used to update users' data into tbl_user
      Parameters:
      email - User can update email
      phone_no - User can update phone number
      staff_id - to control update user's details

    • insertBooking

      public void insertBooking(String room_id, String booking_purpose, String booking_date, String booking_time, String staff_id)
      This method is used to insert booking data into tbl_booking.
      Parameters:
      room_id - User key in room id which is wanted to be booked
      booking_purpose - User key in booking purpose
      booking_date - User key in booking date for the room
      booking_time - User key in booking time for the room
      staff_id - The booking details will be recorded based on the staff id

    • deleteBooking

      public void deleteBooking(String staff_id)
      This method is used to delete the users' data from tbl_booking.
      Parameters:
      staff_id - to delete the room booking by using staff id

    • displayList

      public String displayList()
      This method is used to select all details from tbl_user, tbl_room and tbl_booking for display. The users can see their booking records in the list.
      Returns:
      display booking data (records)

    • insertAdmin

      public void insertAdmin(String staff_id, String school_id)
      This method is used for the user to register as the school admin.
      Parameters:
      staff_id - register admin by using staff id
      school_id - register admin for which school by entering the school id

    • insertRoom

      public void insertRoom(String room_id, String room_description, String maximum_capacity, String school_id)
      This method is used for the admin to add the rooms.
      Parameters:
      room_id - the room that will be added according to the school
      room_description - the room types: Lounge/Student Hall/Lecturer Hall
      maximum_capacity - the room maximum capacity
      school_id - represent different schools

    • displayRoom

      public String displayRoom()
      This method is used to select all details from tbl_room and tbl_school for display.
      Returns:
      room data (room records)

    • updateroom

      public void updateroom(String room_id, String room_desc, String room_max_cap)
      This method is used for admin to update the room details.
      Parameters:
      room_id - the room in different schools
      room_desc - the description of the room (especially the function: Lounge/Student Hall/Lecturer Hall)
      room_max_cap - the maximum capacity of the room
